name: Multiply and Divide with positives and negatives

skills.name: Carry out multiplication problems involving two negative integers
Carry out division problems involving one negative integer
Solve one-step linear equations requiring multiplication or division, involving negative integers
Carry out multiplication problems involving negative fractions (US)

explanations.A: You have correctly multiplied 3 and 7 together to get 21 but now look at the sign... What happens when you multiply a negative by a negative?
explanations.B: I think you have attempted to add the values but you need to multiply them...
explanations.C: When two numbers are next to each other, like in this question, it means they are being multiplied!
explanations.D: A negative multiplied by a negative gives a positive answer so -3 x -7 equals positive 21!

explanations.A: A negative multiplied by a negative gives a positive answer so -4 x -9 equals positive 36!
explanations.B: When two numbers are next to each other, like in this question, it means they are being multiplied!
explanations.C: You have correctly multiplied 4 and 9 together to get 36 but now look at the sign... What happens when you multiply a negative by a negative?
explanations.D: I think you have attempted to add the values but you need to multiply them...

explanations.A: I think you have confused the division symbol with the subtraction symbol... Remember √∑ means divide!
explanations.B: You have correctly divided 88 by 11 to get 8 but now look at the sign... What happens when you divide a negative by a positive?
explanations.C: I think you have confused division with addition... Remember √∑ means divide!
explanations.D: A negative divided by a positive gives a negative answer and 88 √∑ 11 = 8 therefore -88 √∑ 11 = -8!

explanations.A: A negative divided by a positive gives a negative answer and 56 √∑ 8 = 7 therefore -56 √∑ 8 = -7!
explanations.B: I think you have confused the division symbol with the addition symbol... Remember √∑ means divide!
explanations.C: I think you have confused division with subtraction... Remember √∑ means divide!

explanations.A: A positive divided by a negative gives a negative therefore 16 √∑ -2 = -8... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -8!
explanations.B: A negative multiplied by a positive gives a negative therefore -2 x 4 = -8... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -8!
explanations.C: A negative multiplied by a negative gives a positive therefore -1 x -8 = 8, not -8.
explanations.D: A negative multiplied by a positive gives a negative and 1/3 of 24 is 8 therefore -24 x 1/3 = -8... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -8!

explanations.A: A negative multiplied by a positive gives a negative and 1/4 of 24 is 6 therefore -24 x 1/4 = -6... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -6!
explanations.B: A negative multiplied by a negative gives a positive therefore -6 x -1 = 6, not -6.
explanations.C: A positive divided by a negative gives a negative therefore 12 √∑ -2 = -6... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -6!
explanations.D: A negative multiplied by a positive gives a negative therefore -3 x 2 = -6... You're looking for the expression that doesn't give -6!
